channel.title: WebClient Backround help
channel.description: Ok so when I put my backround picture on the web and I try to get the picture like this: [code]Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage(new URL("http://img357.imageshack.us/img357/5404/servernamehereqc6.jpg"));[/code]I can run my client fine and get the backround. But when i put it on the web, I cant get the backround. It says retrying connection in 5 or something like that. Can anyone help me?

item.title: WebClient Backround help
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

Just stick the image in the cache folder, and set the image image =, to ./cache/bg.jpg

Read full topic

item.title: WebClient Backround help
item.dc:creator: @marc_is_hood marc is hood
item.description:
@marc_is_hood wrote:

It has to do with cache or something. But nothing to do with backgrounds lol

EDIT: it means you didnt sign the jar file thats it.

Read full topic
